content.question: If a patient is diagnosed with depression, a cognitive psychologist would likely emphasize which of the following in the patient’s course of treatment?

choices.label: Restructuring the patient’s maladaptive and self-defeating thought processes
Uncovering early childhood events that may have been repressed and are now contributing to the depression
Using exposure therapy to gradually direct the patient to more positive behaviors
Using reflective listening techniques to ensure that the patient feels they are being heard

content.answer: Restructuring the patient’s maladaptive and self-defeating thought processes
